result.eng: I only know him through the Internet.

result.ponchtml: Níl agam air aċ ríoṁaiṫneI only know him through the Internet.

result.eng: The river runs through the city.

result.eng: An airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?

result.eng: Three women were wading through the snow.
